UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Feleucin-K3 Analogue with an α-(4-Pentenyl)-Ala Substitution at the Key Site Has More Potent Antimicrobial and Antibiofilm Activities in Vitro and in Vivo.
Literature.Author: Guo X, Rao J, Yan T, Zhang B, Yang W, Sun W, Xie J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>128µg/ml)
